paper_abstract: In this short paper we shall prove that every bounded lattice L with the conditions: (c1) 1' = 0 and (EL): (a . b')' = b + a' . b' for all a, b is an element of L is a Boolean algebra. This is a more general result than that of Renedo et al. (Proceedings NAFIPS'04, 2004), in which it is proved that every orthocomplemented lattice with (EL) is a Boolean algebra.
paper_title: On bounded lattices satisfying Elkan's law
